picture.caption: Distribution of injected positrons in phase space (top) and coordinate space (left). W. Gai, ANL. A physical aperture of at least 16 mm radius is needed in the wiggler, to ensure adequate injection efficiency. The average injected beam power is 226 kW.
picture.name: combined_0
